title: (PSX-NTSC)-Fear Effect-2 Retro Helix.ISO{xExUxBxExRx}
description:
DISCLAIMER:		

The CDs used to produce these .ISO images were less than perfect,(kind of fucked up).Now while I did test these image files with various PlayStation emulators(more info here:http://www.aldostools.com/psxemus.html),and they did work,understandably,I do not have the patients to do a full game play through. So if you experience any major problems playing this game,please let me and everyone who wants to download this torrent know by leaving a comment here  on this page. Please do not leave any over negative or inappropriate comments,I&#039;m simply trying to share,not annoy.   

                              Fear Effect 2 Retro Helix

Platform:PSX

Genre:Action/Shooter

Publisher:Eidos

Developer:Eidos

ESRP Rating:M [MATURE]

Follow up to its cult classic predecessor Fear Effect.
Resident Evil type gameplay with nice cel-shaded graphics,
solid game overall.

Anarcy is no excuse for chaos and disorder...SEED OR DIE!!
